112.content: Before, I am joking to my friends, aquaintances, brothers, sisters, etc...until one day, a stranger talk to me about something beautiful. I am amazed by his presentation of the story that I actually called him always to continue the story. I mean, it is a story, but in actual I have to deal with other people to continue the story. If I cannot deal with these people, the story, he won't give the real meaning of the story. I followed his instructions and I found out later that it's only a joke for me. Now I am not joking to anybody even here in WDC. So, I am serious now and not joking. Okay? But, I will give you an assignment to make a joke/s.

115.content:
The ancient vampire lay in a torporific state, oblivious to his physical surroundings. Though his body be a prisoner of the soulless land of Catatonia while the sun still ruled the sky, his mind rode Xanadu’s sacred river Alph down to the sunless sea.

He slept not the dreamless sleep of the dead but the eternal morpheus sleep of the undead. His dreams flickered across the cobwebs of his mind like the silent films that fascinated him a century ago.

Dreams of the countless loves lost, senseless wars fought, and unspeakable horrors committed, danced through his head, unbidden. And the sun-- like all nosferatu, the vampire dreamed of the sun and the bittersweet day when last they embraced.

Here tucked in the protective confines of his coffin, sealed within the safety of the mausoleum, the creature basked in the brilliance of a harmless imagined star. A star so bright it brought a crimson tear to his ghoulish eye. He basked in the glow, savoring the sensation of warmth upon his sun kissed skin, flesh glistening with perspiration.

Perspiring from the heat of Helios … heat … The heat was intense. The fiend did not understand. The smell of charred cloth and burning hair -- his hair-- penetrated the misty veil of his consciousness. The searing pain that invaded every fiber of his languid frame was unbearable. How was this happening?

The vampire fought monstrously to break the grip of the supernatural lethargy that plagued him. Screaming in mindless frustration and willing his limbs to move. He felt his skin smolder and crack as he simmered in his own bloody juices. In one mammoth act of desperation, he flung open the lid and slithered weakly over the side, congealing in a pool on the floor of his tomb like drying blood.

The coolness of the marble floor revitalized the still smoking vampire. Standing to his full height, he surveyed his surroundings, quickly deducing what had taken place. With moral indignation and outrage he yelled…

“Who's the wise-ass that put me in the tanning bed!”
115.title: Other jokes (as in jokes not in the categories ...

1151.content:
A screenwriter comes home to a burned down house. His sobbing and slightly-singed wife is standing outside. “What happened, honey?” the man asks.

“Oh, John, it was terrible,” she weeps. “I was cooking, the phone rang. It was your agent. Because I was on the phone, I didn’t notice the stove was on fire. It went up in second. Everything is gone. I nearly didn’t make it out of the house. Poor Fluffy is--”

“Wait, wait. Back up a minute,” The man says. “My agent called?”
1151.title: Clean Jokes

11511.content:
A linguistics professor was lecturing to his English class one day. "In English," he said, "a double negative forms a positive. In some languages, though, such as Russian, a double negative is still a negative. However, there is no language wherein a double positive can form a negative."

A voice from the back of the room piped up, "Yeah, right."

12111.content:
It happened in a bar in the old Wild West. Outside stands a stallion laughing. After a short pause however, he whines and cryes out loud.

The cowboy: "Because I told him I had the bigger penis."
"And why is it crying now?"
" 'Cos I showed him."

1212.content:
A man walks into a bar and sees a jar stuffed with 10 dollar bills. He walks to the bar and asks whats up with the jar. The bartender explains:

"It's a contest, if you pass all three tests you win the jar, but the catch is you have to pay the $10 to hear the rules"

Being very self-confident he takes out a 10 dollar bill and stuffs it in the jar.

"OK, first you have to drink a gallon of pepperd tequilla in under 5 minutes without puking it up,
Then you have to go out back to the pit bull, and remove its sore tooth,
Then you have to go upstiars and satisfy the woman upstiars in room 12 who has never had an orgasim in her life"

The man gets really angry and stomps off shouting obcenities that he just got ripped off 10 dollars and no one could do all that. About an hour later the same man staggers up to the bar completely drunk out of his mind. He slams another bill on the bar.

"Where'zzat Tequilllaa?"

He takes the jug, and slams it down without taking a single breath. Tears are pouring down the sides of his face and he begins to violently shake. But in the end he finished it off like a pro and staggers out the back door towards the pit bull. After a short moment of scilence, from the back is heard a massive comotion of screams and growls. After 10 minutes of what sounds like a very violent struggle between the man and the pit bull, the man staggers into the bar, shirt torn, bleeding, covered in dirt and mud.

"OK, Nowwhere'zzat woman with the sore tooth?"

1222.content:
A Jewish man, a Black man, and a White man were walking down a country road since their car had broken down. It was getting toward dark so they stopped at a farm and asked to spend the night. The old farmer told them they could stay but warned them not to bother his beautiful daughter. They all went too bed and through out the night took turns visiting the daughter.

The next morning the farmer wakes them all up at gun point. "I told you not to mess with my daughter! Now you'll all be severely punished. Go out to the garden, pick a vegetable, and bring it to me."

Thinking they were getting off pretty easy they all went to the garden. The Jewish man picked a cucumber and returned to the farmer. The farmer took the cucumber, told the Jewish man to drop his drawers and bend over. Then the farmer abruptly shoved the cucumber where the sun doesn't shine!

The white guy came in carrying an ear of corn. He was tolld to drop his drawers and the ear of corner was inserted in a forbidden cavity.

Suddenly both the Jew and the white man burst out laughing.

"What's so funny" asked the farmer.

"Poor George is coming now" the white guy answered. "He's carrying that six inch diameter zucchini squash you grew!"
1222.title: Longish Racial jokes

12221.content:
On the roof of a very tall building are four men; one is asian, one is mexican, one is black, and the last one is white. The asian walks to the ledge and says, "This is for all my people" and jumps off the roof. Next, the mexican walks to the ledge and also says, "This is for all my people" and then he jumps off the roof. Next is the black guy's turn. The black guy walks to the ledge and says, "This is for all my people" and then throws the white guy off the roof.

I can't and won't claim authorship for that joke. Like any joke i tell I heard or read it elsewhere. I found this one at this link: http://staging.laughfactory.com/
12221.title: Another Racial Joke but with an unexpected twist

123.content:
A bear was chasing a rabbit through the woods. They passed a frog who yelled "Stop chasing eachother and I will grant you both 3 wishes each." They agreed and sat still in front of the frog. The bear went first, "I wish that all the bears in this forest, except for me, were female." The frog croaked, and it was so. The rabbit thought for a minute and got an evil little twinkle in his eye. "I wish for a motorcycle helmet." The frog croaked and a helmet appeard next to the rabbit. The bear gave the rabbit a strange look but was too selfish to understand his intentions. The bear wished again "I wish all the bears in the entire world, except for me, were female"
the frog croaked, and it was so. The rabbit almost imediatly spoke up "I wish for a motorcycle" the frog croaked and a motorcycle appeard. The bear thought for a moment..."I wish that I could live having constant sex for the rest of my life" The frog croaked and it was so. The rabbit chuckled softly to himself then straped on his helmet, climed onto the motorcycle and started it up. He looks at the bear, smirks evily and then says to the frog...
"I wish the bear was gay" then took off like a bat outta hell.
123.title: Animal jokes

choices: Damn it, why don't I get three choices when I need them?
1231.content:
Once upon a time, a woman met a fairy which granted her three wishes.
The woman said: "I wish for a lot of money!"
(The fairy sighed, because that was THE standard first wish. But she granted it anyway.)
Then the woman received the cash, she said: "I wish I'd live in a really big castle."
(The fairy raised an eyebrow, because the standard second wish was "I wish for another lot of money".)
Then her wish was granted, the woman's look fell upon her tomcat, and she said: "I wish my cat would turn into a beautiful prince, and we would live forever together."
The fairy was even more surprised by this one. After she granted it, she disappeared, saying: "Have a nice time with it!"
Actually, the woman had dirty thoughts about this wish. She leaded her cat into her bed room and stripped naked. Then she pressed her body against his, he smiled widely and said with a high voyce: "Now you regret you've castrated me three months ago, right?"
1231.title: More animal jokes

124.content:
A man is walking along on a journey all by his lonesome. To find himself, to visit some great tourist destination... You know, the kind of random journeys everybody takes. As he's traveling along, he notices it's getting late and decides to find a place to stay. As he passes a fellow passerby on the dirt road, he stops to ask him "Hey, how far away is the Old Log Inn?"

The passerby tells him that it's about an hour's walk from where he is, and that he'll have to take a right turn at an upcoming intersection. After thanking the passerby, the man continues on his way. When he gets to the intersection, he sees a little boy standing in the middle of the fork in the road and asks him "Hey kid, how far is the Old Log Inn?"

The boy points him in the right direction and tells him that it's just a little ways more. As the man continues along the way he has chosen, he eventually finds himself walking through a large, grassy plain with a young couple making love amidst the flowers. Walking up to the young couple, he asks "How far is the Old Log Inn?"

To which the young woman responds...

"ALL THE WAY!!!!!"
124.title: Dirty Lil' Sex Joke My Dad Taught Me

after that last report the couple stops haveing sex confused. The father asks "how do you know that?"
his son replies "Their son is standing on the balcony too."

He leaned in close and the baby poked him in the forehead "How do you like it?!"

124111.content:
3 men in line to get into heaven, St. Peter at the gate filtering out the oncommers. To the 3 men St. Peter explained the rules:

"In heaven you all get a vehicle and a home, the quality of these items are dependent on how loyal you were to your spouse on earth"

The frist man walked up to the gate and was asked the quesstion "How many times did you cheat on your spouse or significant other?"

to which he replied "Never once, didn't even think about it." As a reward he was given a Z06 Corvette and a 3 story mansion.

The second mans response to the same question : "Once or twice when I was really drunk or on vacation." He was given a mini-van and a 1 bedroom appartment.

The third man answered "Truthfully, I lost count of all the women i had on the side." St. Peter ,although disgusted with the man, had to give him something, so he got a beat up, falling apart, rust bucket punch bug, and a run down trailor.

A few days go by, and the guy in the bug rolls up next to the man in the Corvette, who was crying.

The first man asked "Dude, what are you crying about, you got the sweetest ride and the nicest house in the place?"

To which he repplied "Its not the car or the house, I just saw my wife on a skateboard carring a cardboard box under her arm."
124111.title: More Sex Jokes

124112.content:
I needed to find a place to put these, so I figured I'd list them under "Other People's Jokes." Basically, the punchline of each of these jokes references an infamous despot in history. Most of them are pretty bad (as I came up with them myself) but they're good for a big groan, which can be just as therapeutic as a good laugh!

Q: What did they call the young leader of the Nazi Party when he showed up to the prom with a large pimple on his nose?
A: Adolf Zitler

Q: What did they call the young leader of the Nazi Party after his sex change operation?
A: Adolf Titler

Q: Who is the leader of the Infamous Fascist-farm Animals Party (I-FAP)?
A: Moo-solini

Q: And the infamous Fascist Cat Party?
A: Meowsolini

Q: How did a critic of the government respond when the leader of the Khmer Rouge called him murderous?
A: "That's like the Pol Pot calling the kettle black!"

Q: What do you call a porn star from the Soviet Union?
A: A cummunist

Q: How did the leader of the Soviet Union respond when met with questions about how sustainable his economic system was?
A: He started Stalin for time

If anyone knows some good Hideki Tojo jokes, please tell me so I can skewer all three members of the Axis Powers!
124112.title: Dictator Jokes!

1241122.content:
A more modern day abusive ruler:

Q: What would you call the Iranian President if he learned to play the piano very well?
A: Mahmoud Bach-madinejad

Although I personally don't consider him a dictator or even an incompetent ruler...

Q: How do you cheer on the Venezuelan President?
A: Hugo (You go), Chavez!

That's enough for now... maybe...
1241122.title: Few More Dictator Jokes I Forgot

1242.content: Three explorers were shipwrecked on a tropical island.As they walked further into the jungle they came across a tribe of natives.They were then brought to the tribes village as prisoners.The chief offered them a deal:they complete 2 tasks or they die.They all agreed.The first task was to gather ten types of fruit and report back for the second task.Bob and Jeff,being the fastest gathered their fruit first and reported back.While they waited for Larry,their slow friend to return the chief began their second task.They had to shove all ten peices of fruit up their ass while making no noise,or they die on the spot.Bob had choosen ten apples and only got three up his ass before moaning in pain,so they cut off his head.Jeff luckily had picked ten small grapes and fared much better.However on the final one he burst out laughing,and he too,had his head cut off.Bob and Jeff both meet in haven.Bob says"Dude, you almost had it, why'd you laugh!!!!!!????"So Jeff says"I saw Larry walking back with an armload of pineapples!"
1242.title: 3 explorers

12421.content: A man meets a beautiful woman walking down the street while driveing his car on his day off.He asks if she'd like to go on a date with him in the countryside.She agrees, so they leave the city and head to the country.Later that night they are about to have sex on the side of the road in their car when the woman says"I'm sorry,I should have told you before,but I'm a hooker and it'll cost you $100 for sex."Begrudgeingly he pays her and they have sex.Afterwards the man climbs upfront,but does'nt start the car.After waiting for 20 minutes the woman asks"Why don't you start the car?Its late and I would like to go home." "Oh?"replys the man."Well I should have told you before,but I'm a cab driver and it'll cost you $200 to get back to the city."

13.content: Lil' Johnny is about 5-8 years old and he's at the age of wonder. Everything and anything has a deeper meaning. And unfortunatly Lil' johnny takes everything the wrong way.
13.title: The Chronicles of Lil Johnny

131.content:
Lil' Johnny's family is getting ready for thanksgiving. His mom and dad are upstairs arguing. "You are such a bastard!" "Well your a stingy bitch!" His father stomps out of the room into the bathroom. Johnny enters and asks his mother "Mommy whats a bastard and a bitch?" she replies "Well a bastard is another word for a gentleman and a bitch is another word for a lady" she leaves Johnny wondering and goes downstairs. Johnny wanders to his brothers room who is in the middle of his health homework. "Conception occurs when the man puts his penis in the vagina..." Johnny speaks up "Bro whats a penis and vagina?" His brother not wanting to explain the "birds and the bees" says " A penis is a type of mans hat and a vagina is a ladys overcoat" He shoos Johnny out of the room and Johnny goes to find his father in the bathroom shaving. He cuts himself and says "Shit!" "Daddy whats shit?" His dad startled says "It's the type of shaving cream I use." Johhny accepts the answer and goes downstairs to find his mother cutting the turkey. She accedently cuts her finger "Fuck!" "Mommy whats fuck mean?" She replies "Its a special way to cut the turkey" At that statement the doorbell rings and Johnny runs to greet his guests.

He gathers them all in the front hall and proudly exlaims to the group:

"Welcome bitches and bastards, may I take your penises and vaginas? Mom's in the kitchen fucking the turkey, and dads upstiars wiping the shit off his face."
131.title: Lil' Johnny and the holidays

132.content:
Lil' johnny came home from school one day and asked his dad "Daddy what's Politics?"
he replied "Ok, I'll try to explain it in a way you can relate to. Since im the head of the household lets call me Government, your mother is second in command so we'll call her The Senate. The nanny does alot of the chores so we'll call her the Working Class. We provide for you so lets call you The People and your baby brother is the Future. So think about it and see what you can tell me in the morning. Johnny did his homework, ate dinner and went to bed all the time thinking about what his father had said. He woke up in the middle of the night to the sound of his brother crying. He went to his room and found he had soiled his diaper. He went to his parents room and found his mother fast asleep. Not wanting to disturb her, he went to the nanny's room but the door was locked. He peeked through the keyhole and saw his dad having sex with the nanny. He gave up and went back to bed. In the morning he jumped merrily down the stairs to his dad at the breakfast table and gleefully announced "Dad I think I understand politics now." His dad encouringinly replied "Good, explain to me what you think politics are and how they work"
He replied
"While the Government is screwing the Working Class, The Senate is fast asleep, The people are being ignored and the Futuer is in deep shit."
132.title: Lil' Johnny and politics

133.content:
In sunday school the teacher asks the group "What part of the body do you think goes to heaven first?"
Lil' Suzie answers "I think its your hands because you put them together when you pray"
David interupts "No its your chest because thats where your heart is and thats where the power of Jesus lives"
The teacher says "Good answers, anyone else have an opinion?"
Lil' Johnny raises his hand and says "I think its your legs"
The teacher, well aware of Johnny's misunderstanding of things reluctantly asks "Why do you think that?"
He answers:
"Because last night I saw my mommy in bed with the neighbor with her legs straight up in the air screaming "Oh God im comming!""
133.title: Lil' Johnny and sunday school

1331.content:
The sunday school teacher gave the students and assignment to find out something exciting about something interesting. The kids all went home to find their interesting topics.

The next week they all came into class and one by one told their interesting tales. Johnny purposely waited 'til everyone was done.

The teacher called on Johnny and he went up to the board, drew a dot, turned and went back and sat down.

The teacher asked "What is that?"

"Its a period" replyed Johnny.

"Well I can see that, but whats so interesting about a period?" said the teacher

Johnny said "Hell if I know but yesterday 'sis said she missed hers, Mom fainted, dad had a heart attack, and the guy next door left the country"
1331.title: More sunday school jokes

13311.content:
Lil' Susie was a girl in sunday school that always falls asleep. So one day Johnny decides to teach her a lesson. He brings in a needle to stick her with everytime she dozes off.

So the teacher was in the middle of a lecture and , as expected, Susie began to fall asleep.

"What is the name of our father in heaven?"
Johnny sticks the pin in Susies back

"Good God!" She yelled "Yes Susie, good job."

As the lecture continued, Susie fell back asleep.

"What is the name of our lord and savior?" asked the teacher
Lil' Johnny stabbed Susie with the pin again

"Jesus Christ!" she exclaimed at the poke "Yes Susie thats correct."

Later in the lecture Susie fell asleep once again.

"What do you think Eve said to Adam after she gave birth to their 7th child?"
Another jab from Johnny.

"If you stick that thing in me one more time I'm gonna break it in half and make you eat it!"
13311.title: More

134.content:
Lil' Johnny is walking around bored
He goes to his dads room but the doors locked
He knocks and says "Dad whatcha up too?"
His dad replies "Playin' cards" Lil Johnny asks "Whos your partner?"
"Your mother now go away"
He runs over to his brothers room whos door is also locked
"Hey bro whatcha doin'?"
His brother replies "Playin cards with my girlfriend, now go away"
Johnny runs off to his room and closes the door
His mom and dad finish "Playin cards" and his dad walks down the hall and sees that Johnnys door is shut and locked
He walks over "Hey Johnny whatcha doin'?"
Johnny replies "Playin' cards"
His dad curiously, but coutiously asks"...Oh...really...who's your partner?"
To which Johnny replies
"You don't need a partner if you got a good hand"
134.title: Lil' Johnny playin' cards

135.content:
Little Johnny had been hearing quite a bit about 'courting' from the older boys, and he wondered what it was and how it was done. One day he took his question to his mother, who became rather flustered. Instead of explaining things to Johnny, she told him to hide behind the curtains one night and watch his older sister and her boyfriend.

This he did. The following morning, Johnny described everything to his mother. "Sis and her boyfriend sat and talked for a while, then he turned off most of the lights. Then he started kissing and hugging her. I figured Sis must be getting sick, because her face started looking funny. He must have thought so too, because he put his hand inside her blouse to feel her heart, just the way the doctor would. Except he's not as smart as the doctor because he seemed to have trouble finding her heart.

I guess he was getting sick too, because pretty soon both of them started panting and gettin all out of breath. His other hand must of been cold because he put it under her skirt. About this time Sis got worse and began to moan and sigh and squirm around and slide down toward the end of the couch. This was when her fever started. I knew it was a fever, because Sis told him she felt really hot.

Finally, I found out what was making them so sick, a big eel had gotten inside his pants somehow. It just jumped out of his pants and stood there, about 10 inches long, honest anyway, he grabbed it in one hand to keep it from getting away.

When Sis saw it, she got really scared, her eyes got big, and her mouth fell open, and she started calling out to God and stuff like that. She said it was the biggest one she's ever seen; I should tell her about the ones down at the lake.

Anyway, Sis got brave and tried to kill the eel by biting its head off. All of a sudden she grabbed it with both hands and held it tight while he took a muzzle out of his pocket and slipped it over the eel's head to keep it from biting again. Sis lay back and spread her legs so she could get a scissor -- lock on it and he helped by lying on top of the eel.

The eel put up a hell of a fight. Sis started groaning and squealing and her boyfriend almost upset the couch. I guess they wanted to kill the eel by squashing it between them.

After a while they both quit moving and gave a great sigh. Her boyfriend got up, and sure enough, they killed the eel. I knew because it just hung there, limp, and some of its insides were hanging out.

Sis and her boyfriend were a little tired from the battle, but they went back to courting anyway. He started hugging and kissing her again. By golly, the eel wasn't dead! It jumped straight up and started to fight again. I guess eels are like cats -- they have nine lives or something.

This time, Sis jumped up and tried to kill it by sitting on it. After a 35 minute struggle, they finally killed the eel. I knew it was dead, because I saw Sis's boyfriend peel its skin off and flush it down the toilet."

His mother fainted.
135.title: Lil' Johnny and courting

14.content: Stand up comedy is a passion of mine, this section is unlike the rest in that its just a place to rant. for anyone who has ever seen a stand up comedy show, you'll know what i'm talking about.
14.title: Rants

141.content: Hypothetical situation, a guy who is higher than the Hubble telescope on crystal meth and paint thinner breaks into your house, steals everything you own, rapes and murders your children wife and dog, beats the shit out of you and ties you to a phone pole and makes you watch him burn your house to the ground. A few days later he gets arrested and charged with breaking and entering, burglary, premeditated homicide, and bestiality. He gets 7 consecutive life sentences without a chance for parole. He is going to spend the rest of his and his grandchildren’s life in prison. The media is going to call it “justice”. Justice was served. He got what he deserved. And that’s that, everyone goes on about their lives as you try to rebuild yours. Now let’s look at it from the perspective no one ever thinks about. This man has literally taken your entire life away from you and you will never fully recover. And now you, as a free taxpaying citizen of the united states, get to spend the rest of your life, paying for his permanent residency in the form of an 8x8 cell with a bucket to shit in and a slab of crab infested wool to sleep on. You get to pay for him to have 3 meals a day. You get to pay for his gym membership, his laundering services, his rehabilitation, his education on how to find a gang in prison to survive with, his babysitting fees in the form of the prison guards salaries, and last but not least you get to pay every single penny of his healthcare expenses. Something you never thought about isn’t it? All prisoners on this planet have all expense paid healthcare. Because you ,as free taxpaying citizen of the united states, get to front the bill. You get to pay for all the stitches from shiv wounds, and to get his asshole resized and his therapy sessions because a black guy named “big bubba” got a little frisky in the shower. In the meantime the blow to your mental health which prevents you from ever being able to hold a job at a pay grade above shoveling cow shit, means that you have no means to get yourself a permanent residence, or a bucket to shit in, or a crab infested slab of wool to sleep on, or 3 meals a day, or a gym membership, or laundering services, or rehabilitation, or education, or any form of healthcare. Because justice was served. But let’s look at it from another perspective. A crime that heinous should certainly be worthy of the death penalty. However most of the states in America don’t like the capital punishment. So if this happens anywhere in the country other than Texas, this is what happens. 3-10 years of court battles and appeals and overrulings and controversies and delays and overpaid lawyers battling your fresh out of a third rate law school in a third world country public defender asshole. But through it all he finally gets sentenced to death. And then he will sit on death row for 5+ years, while you pay for his entire life after you’ve paid for the millions of dollars worth of court battles. But through it all, finally the day comes where you get to pay for his execution. A lethal injection which contains a secret cocktail of deadly chemicals that probably cost you thousands of dollars each. But through it all, you get to watch this brutal heartless man who stole your life get put down. After they give him an alcohol swab that you also paid for. I mean common, We’re killing the bastard, the least we could do is make sure he doesn’t get an infection. So you tell me does that sound like the kind of justice we should have to live with? Regular people in this country have to fight and claw their way around the workplace to ensure they have enough money to put food on the table, and just because they happen to be free taxpaying citizens of the united states, a percentage of that goes to make sure rapists, murderers, drug dealers, maniacs, cannibals, and thieves have a quality meal, plenty of time in the sunshine to lift weights and sodomize one another and free healthcare. Meanwhile you have to pay 600 dollars to take your child to the hospital because he wrecked his bike in the street on the pothole that the state just doesn’t have the spare money to fix.
141.title: Prison

info.brief_description: Not a story just a bunch of jokes
info.description:
This is not a story it's just a bunch of jokes. I made it interactive so you could add your own and share your jokes and those you heard.


Yes dirty jokes and swearing are allowed.
